job_listings.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
job_listings.description: We are looking for a skilled Business Intelligence Analyst to join our team...
job_listings.requirements: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field. Experience with SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools. Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
job_listings.responsibilities: Analyze business data to identify trends and insights. Create dashboards and reports. Collaborate with stakeholders to support business decisions.
